div.div: Lawrence Univ. vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: Lawrence wins toss and defers. St. Norbert receiving north end zone.
Pat O'Mahoney kickoff 61 yards to the SNC04, out-of-bounds, SNC ball on SNC35.
St. Norbert College drive start at 15:00.
Brad Boockmeier rush for 1 yard to the SNC36 (Alic Riedel).
Brad Boockmeier rush for 5 yards to the SNC41 (Dan Rothbauer).
Elijah Fort rush for 8 yards to the SNC49 (Jake Gostisha).
Jack Becker rush for 51 yards to the LU00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 13:11.

R. Butterfield rush for 6 yards to the LU43 (Wyatt Veseth).

R. Butterfield rush for 2 yards to the LU43 (Tony Altmann).
Cole Erickson punt 34 yards to the SNC23, downed.
